title: behavioural loot restrictions
body: so umm, when does this shit run out? i got a chat ban a while ago did the thing and done probably like 10 - 20 games after that and i'm still getting loot restricted?

replies.body: can i just say this is absolutely ridiculous, like be a good little boy and you can earn loot again, seriously im a good sport 98% of the time and never get a good teammate or friendly honors,, but the one time i'm annoyed and my team push me, and i snap at them and get reported i get a chat restriction. and still cant earn loot because nobody honors anymore is just pathetic.

It isn't a specific time that you have to wait out, but is completely dependent upon your behavior. The reform period is also much longer than the actual punishment period.

[Take a look at this for more info](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions)♥
